data.title: Globalhead by Bruce Sterling, Signed
data.meta_description: Globalhead by Bruce Sterling (First Edition) Signed by Bruce Sterling and a great selection of related books, art and collectibles available now at AbeBooks.com.
data.text:
Hardcover. Condition: Fine. Dust Jacket Condition: Fine. 1st Edition. First edition, stated. Signed by Sterling on the title page. A fine copy in a fine mylar protected DJ. See photos. All copies are in my possession and ships securely packed in a cardboard box. Signed by Author(s).

Mass Market Paperback. Condition: Very Good +. First Edition. SIGNED by the AUTHOR on the Title page. Signature only First edition, First printing. Book is in Very Good + condition. Boards are clean, tiny bit of edge wear. Fore edges have a small amount of shelf wear. Interior is clean and legible. Not remaindered. Thanks and Enjoy. All-Ways well boxed, All-Ways fast service. Thanks. Signed by Author(s). Book.

Hardcover. Condition: As New. Dust Jacket Condition: As New. 1st Edition. Signed, numbered and slipcased edition. Book, jacket and slipcase are all in as new condition. Pictures sent on request. Signed by Author(s).

SIGNED hardcover first edition - First printing - limited signed edition. Collects 13 stories by this cyberpunk writer, including two collaborations, one with Rudy Rucker & the other with James Patrick Kelly. #72 out of 375 numbered SIGNED copies of the deluxe edition. 301 pp. Fine in fine dust jacket in a fine slipcase.

Octavo, cloth. First edition. One of 375 numbered copies signed by Sterling. Collects thirteen stories. Sterling's second collection of short fiction. See Anatomy of Wonder (1995) 4-438. A fine copy in fine dust jacket and paper slipcase. (#157841).

Octavo, cloth. First edition. One of 375 numbered copies signed by Sterling. Collects thirteen stories. Sterling's second collection of short fiction. See Anatomy of Wonder (1995) 4-438. A fine copy in fine dust jacket and paper slipcase. (#91406).

Hardcover. Condition: Fine. Dust Jacket Condition: Fine. 1st Edition. Book and DJ are fine in slipcase. Limited edition Signed by the Author. With this I have included Zeitgeist with signed Author plate laid in also fine with fine dj. Signed by Author(s). Book.

Hard Cover. Condition: Fine (see description). Dust Jacket Condition: Fine (see description). William Latham Cover Art (illustrator). First Edition. -------------( 1st Printing of the First Edition ) ---hardcover, a Fine example in a Fine dustjacket, housed in a Near Fine slipcase, #46 of 375 copies, signed by Schow and Fenner, this contains: Our Neural Chernobyl; Storming the Cosmos; The Compassionate, the Digital; Sword of Damocles; The Gulf Wars; Shores of Bohemia; The Moral Bullet; The Unthinkable; Hollywood Kremlin; We See Things Differently; Are You for 86?; Dori bangs, any image directly beside this listing is the actual book and not a generic photo /// SIGNED ---GUARANTEED to be AVAILABLE/// ---sizes are approximate (generally within 1/8 inch)--- Size: 6.75w x 9.5h Inches. Signed (see description). NOT Price Clipped.
